attributes.action: Remove David Davis MP as Minister as he lied to Parliament
attributes.additional_details: When David Davis appeared in front of the committee for leaving the EU on the 06/12/2017 he said there were no impact assessments on the consequences of exit. It means he either lied to Parliament when he announced they where being compiled or was lying to the committee. It is unacceptable for a minister to hold Parliament in contempt. He must be removed and an investigation into this commenced
attributes.background: David Davis MP is holding Parliament in contempt and must be removed

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs and Cabinet Ministers to be sacked.
